translation.abstractDescription: This template provides an excellent foundation for your next project, incorporating modern tools and best practices to streamline development.
translation.includedFeatures: This template includes the following features:
translation.feature1: TypeScript for robust and scalable code.
translation.feature2: React Navigation for intuitive and flexible screen navigation.
translation.feature3: State Management with Redux Toolkit, Redux Saga, and Redux Persist to handle complex state logic and persistence.
translation.feature4: AsyncStorage for efficient local data storage.
translation.feature6: React Native SVG for handling scalable vector graphics.
translation.feature7: Reanimated 3 and React Native Gesture Handler for powerful animations and gesture controls.
translation.feature8: Built-in support for splash screens, along with dark mode and light mode themes.
translation.descriptionSummary: This template is designed to be easy to customize and extend, allowing you to adapt it to meet the unique needs of your project.
